alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rockingham and southeastern Hillsborough Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 423 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Merrimack, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Nashua, Derry, Merrimack, Bedford, Milford, Amherst, Litchfield, Hollis, New Boston, Mont Vernon, Hudson, Pelham, Mount Vernon, Brookline, Londonderry and Windham. This includes Interstate 93 between mile markers 10 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Western And Central Hillsborough
